sentences.en: "I see no basis in any of that speculation, " he told reporters in Perth.
sentences.cn: 他在珀斯告诉记者：“我看不到那种推测有任何根据。”

sentences.en: Among the passengers were Isabelle Chu from Australia's western city of Perth.
sentences.cn: 乘客中有一位是澳大利亚西部城市佩斯的朱女士.

sentences.en: As the plane came in at Perth International Airport, Alice had a moment of fear.
sentences.cn: 当飞机降落在珀斯国际机场时, 爱丽丝忽然有些担心.

sentences.en: Born in the Netherlands, he migrated to Perth in 1951.
sentences.cn: 出生于荷兰, 他迁移到珀斯于1951年.

sentences.en: From there, he will fly to Perth.
sentences.cn: 从那里, 他再飞往珀斯.

sentences.en: He will soon visit Darwin. From there, he will fly to Perth.
sentences.cn: 他不久还将到达尔文去, 从那里, 他再飞往珀斯.

sentences.en: I'll try to save him the expense of a flight from Perth.
sentences.cn: 我会设法替他省下要从珀斯飞来的机票费用。

sentences.en: It's a hell of a hike from Sydney to Perth.
sentences.cn: 从悉尼到珀斯的徒步旅行简直苦死了.

sentences.en: Just like Sydney, Perth has a superb climate.
sentences.cn: 珀斯是西澳大利亚州的首府, 风景秀美,气候宜人.

sentences.en: Major Cities: Canberra, Sydney, Melbourne, Brisbane, Perth, Adelaide, Newcastle, Golden Coast, Gelling , Darwin.
sentences.cn: 主要城市: 堪培拉 、 悉尼 、 墨尔本 、 布里斯班 、 珀思 、 阿德莱德 、 纽卡斯尔 、 黄金海岸 、 霍巴特、杰隆 、 达尔文.

sentences.en: Perth home of the glorious opening it assumed a posture of large - scale offensive.
sentences.cn: 主场作战的珀斯光荣开场便摆出一副大举进攻的架势.

sentences.en: Perth is the capital of Western Australia and is surrounded by spectacular nature.
sentences.cn: 和之相对,珀斯的周边地区是澳大利亚发展和进步最快的地方.

sentences.en: The inquiry continues in Perth and Canberra, with a report due in September.
sentences.cn: 质询将在佩斯和堪培拉继续举行, 预期将在九月报道.

sentences.en: They live in big coastal cities such as Brisbane, Sydney, Adelaide, Melborune, and Perth.
sentences.cn: 澳大利亚人都居住在沿海城市,例如布里斯班, 悉尼, 阿德莱德, 墨尔本以及佩斯.

sentences.en: This rule was passed at the 1998 FINA Congress in Perth, Australia.
sentences.cn: 这项规则是1998年国际泳联在澳大利亚的珀斯通过的.

sentences.en: We sailed from Perth with a cargo of raw ion.
sentences.cn: 我们装着一船生铁从佩思启航.

trans.tran_cn: 珀斯，佩思（澳大利亚城市）
